headline: Ross Gerber Highlights Meta's '$23.6 Billion' Share Buyback Cost, Warns TSLA Shareholders About Stock Compensation
summary: Investor Ross Gerber of the investment firm Gerber Kawasaki has warned Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA) investors of the potential ramifications of stock-based employee compensation, drawing parallels with Meta Platforms Inc.'s (NASDAQ:META) share buybacks. A Real Cost The investor took to the social media platform X on Monday, warning Tesla shareholders that stock compensation was a real cost for companies. "Tesla shareholders should pay attention to this regarding meta," he said, then shared a quote f
